titleStmt.title: Some late epistles to the body writ from time to time, as the Spirit gave utterance; now published in the same. With a lamentation in the life, over all who have shrunk, or may shrink in this day and hour of great tryal and tribulation, inward and outward, that is, and is to be.
titleStmt.author: Swinton, John, 1621?-1679.

titleStmt.title: Some late epistles to the body writ from time to time, as the Spirit gave utterance; now published in the same. With a lamentation in the life, over all who have shrunk, or may shrink in this day and hour of great tryal and tribulation, inward and outward, that is, and is to be.
titleStmt.author: Swinton, John, 1621?-1679.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: 11th 5th month, 1663. J. Swintoun.
Suggested place of publication and imprint date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
